body: Thanks, that is very useful. It seems to me that i would make sense if the metrics would all return a `reset_op` together with the other ops. But that would break existing code. A workaround could be to only return the reset_op if the user specifies an optional `return_reset_op=True` parameter when creating the OP. Is that a sensible approach for this?
